content.rendered:
Expand possibilities with addons

Smart NFT Version 2 offers cutting-edge features that continue to push the boundaries of whats possible in web design.

Explore addons

Full featured addons

A list of Smart NFT plugin addons to make your website more powerful! 

ERC-1155

ERC1155 is a novel token standard that aims to take the best from previous standards to create a fungibility-agnostic and gas-efficient token contract with batch transfers.

Buy addons

BEP/ERC-20

Trade NFTs with custom tokens from ERC20 or BEP20 Standards. Import existing contract of create a contract with custom tokens amounts and trade and earn from multiple chains.

Buy addons

MultiChain

Multichain addons enables you to create a cross platform on multi EVM based chains simultaneously. Mint, trade and earn from multiple chains at a time from SmartNFT plugin.

Buy addons

Auction

NFT auctions are where specific NFT artworks are offered for sale to interested NFT collectors and the highest bidders place their bids to purchase the NFT artwork.

Buy addons

MultiWallet

Smart NFT default Metamask wallet within it. Multiwallet addons focuses to integrate popular wallets like Coinbase, WalletConnect etc.

Buy addons

KYC Verification Badge

Smart NFT addons proceed with verification process to get more visibility and gain trust on NFT marketplace.

Buy addons

Bulk Minting

From today you will be able to create hundred to thousands of nfts with this bulk minter and smart nfts plugin.

Buy addons

Theme

Smart NFT supported feature enhanced theme for kick starting NFT projects and also making the whole system admin / user freindly.

Coming soon

One addons for every stage of your NFT project🚀

By developers. For developers.

  • No coding smart contracts
  • No sending private keys
  • Mint as many NFTs as you need, instantly
Get plugin
Learn more

Full cross-chain support

No need to worry about cross chain compatibility. ERC-1155 enable you to use the same API to build NFT applications across the following chains.

Learn more
Watch video

Start for free

We walk you through on how the feature works and how you can get started fast.
Start for free

Documentation

Check our detailed documentation on how to use our feature in step-by-step details.
View our documentation

Community

If you have a question, join our community on Discord – we would love to help you!
Join our telegram

Ready to get started?

Beautifully Created, Aesthetically designed pages to create a NFT Marketplace in clicks, in no time.
Download now!
Read docs
